LanguageData.OMC_Arachna_AR.label: Mech Striker
LanguageData.OMC_Arachna_AR.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Striker
LanguageData.OMC_Arachna_AR.description: Reconstructed OMC Assault Rifle for use by mechanoids. Rapid-fire and multiple-charge weapons with reduced damage.
LanguageData.OMC_Arachna_AR.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Acid.label: Mech Quasar(Acid)
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Acid.description: Reconstructed OTC Shotgun for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Acid charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Cryo.label: Mech Quasar(Cryo)
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Cryo.description: Reconstructed OTC Shotgun for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Cryo charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Fire.label: Mech Quasar(Fire)
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_Fire.description: Reconstructed OTC Shotgun for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with Fire charges.
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_EMP.label: Mech Quasar(EMP)
LanguageData.OTC_Arachna_Shotgun_EMP.description: Reconstructed OTC Shotgun for use by mechanoids. Balanced weapon with EMP charges.\n\nWarning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OCC_Arachna_Rifle.label: Mech Cerberus
LanguageData.OCC_Arachna_Rifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Cerberus
LanguageData.OCC_Arachna_Rifle.description: Reconstructed OCC Rifle for use by mechanoids. Slow weapon are designed to use blast bullets.
LanguageData.OCC_Arachna_Rifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.OEC_Arachna_SniperRifle.label: Mech Judgement
LanguageData.OEC_Arachna_SniperRifle.description: Reconstructed OEC Sniper Rifle for use by mechanoids. Extremely armor-piercing and equipped with a melee blade.
LanguageData.CAC_Arachna_Minigun.label: Mech Blackout
LanguageData.CAC_Arachna_Minigun.description: Reconstructed CAC Minigun for use by mechanoids. Specially modified weapon with increased power but difficult to handle.
LanguageData.CAC_Arachna_Minigun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
